title: Theme Customizer
description: Interactive theme customization tool built with Next.js and shadcn/ui. Create, preview, and export custom color themes with real-time feedback and click-to-edit functionality.
impact: Enables developers and designers to create custom color themes through an intuitive visual interface, with real-time preview and multiple export formats for seamless integration into projects.
outcomes: Intuitive visual interface for theme creation

modalContent.overview: Built an interactive theme customization tool that allows developers and designers to create, preview, and export custom color themes with real-time feedback and click-to-edit functionality.
challenges: Real-time color scheme updates and preview
solutions: Implemented real-time preview with React state management
Created multiple export formats (CSS, JSON, Tailwind config)
Built intuitive drag-and-drop and click-to-edit interfaces
results: Multiple export options for different use cases
